name: Scrolls (Tuatarian)
description:
Scrolls is a platformer where not only are you always jumping, but your mouse wheel can scroll the level itself. Art is not by me, it is part of Kenney's 1bitplatformer pack. Music is Itty Bitty 8-bit by Kevin MacLeod

--------

This game was made for the 2020 GMTK GameJam. It fits the theme, as you are constantly jumping and have no way of stopping or controlling the speed or height

Summary

- Platformer where player is constantly jumping, and is unable to stop

- Scrolling mouse wheel moves the level up or down, creating interesting puzzles and unique platforming gameplay
